Scripts.OnClick: if IsAltKeyDown() then SBFOptions:Nudge("right", 10) else SBFOptions:Nudge("right", 1) end
if IsAltKeyDown() then SBFOptions:Nudge("left", 10) else SBFOptions:Nudge("left", 1) end
if IsAltKeyDown() then SBFOptions:Nudge("up", 10) else SBFOptions:Nudge("up", 1) end
if IsAltKeyDown() then SBFOptions:Nudge("down", 10) else SBFOptions:Nudge("down", 1) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOP") if SCT and (SCT:Get("SHOWFADE", SCT.FRAMES_TABLE) == SCT.MSG) then GameTooltip:AddLine(SBFOptions.strings.SCTCRITTTM1) GameTooltip:AddLine(SBFOptions.strings.SCTCRITTTM2) else GameTooltip:AddLine(SBFOptions.strings.SCTCRITTT) end GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOP") for k,v in pairs(SBFOptions.strings.SPELLTTLHELP) do GameTooltip:AddLine(v) end GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnClick: self.parent.page = self.parent.page + 1 self.parent.html:SetText(self.parent.pages[self.parent.page]) if self.parent.page == #self.parent.pages then self:Disable() end self.parent.pageStr:SetText(self.parent.page.."/"..#self.parent.pages) SBFOHelpFramePrevButton:Enable()

self.parent.page = self.parent.page - 1 self.parent.html:SetText(self.parent.pages[self.parent.page]) if self.parent.page == 1 then self:Disable() end self.parent.pageStr:SetText(self.parent.page.."/"..#self.parent.pages) SBFOHelpFrameNextButton:Enable()

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if (button == "LeftButton") and IsAltKeyDown() then self.moving = 1 self:StartMoving() end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if self.moving then self:StopMovingOrSizing() self.moving = nil end
